content.body: Adam Rice: Any more thought on the stream close question above? Why is close() alone not sufficient? When constructing a ReadableStream  it is unexpected that you need to call controller.byobRequest.respond(0) after close() when no data is enqueued or risk causing the stream reader to hang.
